privacyComplianceList: OpenG2P is a tool used by adopters, the OpenG2P foundation by itself does not store any PII
locIntlComplianceList: OpenG2P is a tool used by adopters, the OpenG2P foundation by itself does not store any PII

standardsList: w3c verifiable credentials and others under explorations especially around handling of PII
evidenceStandardSupport: Work in progress especially around compliance to open standards around handling and security of PII
bestPracticesList: Principles for Digital Development; the Responsible Digital Payments Guidelines by the Better Than Cash Alliance

inappropriateIllegalContent.type: This is defined by adopters and only collects cash transfer beneficiary demographic data as defined by programs that adopt OpenG2P
inappropriateIllegalContent.illegalContentDetectionMechanism: OpenG2P is a tool used by the adopters independent of the foundation building blocks of OpenG2P.  By design, we don't have visibility of their citizen/beneficiary data.  However, we are investing resources in establishing principals, guidelines, best practices around the collection and storage of data by adopters.
